description: Take a dip, catch some waves, or simply lounge around — this 'Cozy Retreat' is all about you! It’s certainly been a busy day relaxing at this shoreside paradise! The water is warm and the surfboards are handy if you decide to go for a wave. Seashells were abundant when you went scouting — conch, whelks, sand dollars and more — but we’ll leave them behind to help protect the ecosystem. The lounge chairs are waiting with refreshing libations to enjoy while you and your special someone decompress and drink in the glorious sunset. A perfect ending to a perfect day! This 300-piece Large Format jigsaw puzzle combines easy-to-handle, clean-cut pieces and Ravensburger’s perfect interlocking fit for a most pleasurable puzzling experience. With pieces 20% larger than standard, details are easy to see so you can complete it in just a day or two. Create memorable moments with Ravensburger premium puzzles!
